original_text: Moses brought the other male sheep. It was a gift. It showed that God had chosen Aaron's family to become his priests. Aaron and his sons put their hands on the sheep's head.
korean_text: 또 다른 숫양 곧 위임식의 숫양을 드릴새 아론과 그의 아들들이 그 숫양의 머리에 안수하매

sentences.original_text: Moses brought the other male sheep
It showed that God had chosen Aaron's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 아론의 가족을 선택하셨음을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Aaron and his sons put their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들은 그들의 손을 올렸습니다
